name: ALLEGHANY COLLEGE PUBLIC FUNDING - ALIC
sampleDescriptions: the House submission was for the US Department of Commerce NIST Program, and the Senate submissions were for the US Department of Education Fund for the Improvement of Postsecondary Education.
